snippet: There is nothing wrong with state officeholders raising money for their favorite charities during legislative sessions or with prominent people contributing, but it is difficult to believe everyone’s motives are pure.
lead_paragraph: There is nothing wrong with state officeholders raising money for their favorite charities during legislative sessions or with prominent people contributing, but it is difficult to believe everyone’s motives are pure.

headline.seo: When Texas’ Political Donors Go to Charity Galas
